target: broughton house gallery is also located in the centre of town. Their phone number is 01223314960. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
context: <user>  i am looking for a place to stay. The hotel should include free wifi and should include free parking. <system>  What about acorn house? Would you like their phone number? <user>  Can you please give me the confirmation number for my booking? <system>  Your reservation has been made for Alexander Bed and Breakfast for 2 days starting Friday for 6 people Your reference number is 9ZK2B30Y .
